name: F64
description:
A racing game made with Godot for the Lowrez Jam 2020.

The spritesheet is also 64 by 64 pixels in size and uses only 7 colors (dimming on UI not included). Code and assets will be made available after the voting is closed.

Controls:

W/S - Accellerate/Brake

A/D - Left/Right

Font used is altopixel by lqdev.
